articles.title: US tariffs on European goods threaten to shake up the world's largest 2-way trade relationship - AP News

articles.content: FRANKFURT, Germany (AP) Americas largest trade partner, the European Union, is among the entities awaiting word Monday on whether U.S. President Donald Trump will impose punishing tariffs on their go… [+7146 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk says he is launching new America Party - BBC
articles.description: The world's richest man says he is setting up a new political organisation called the America Party.
articles.content:
Sean Seddon & Stuart Lau
Elon Musk says he is launching a new political party, weeks after dramatically falling out with US President Donald Trump.
